description: Abana bato bakunda gushyira ibyo babonye byose mu kanwa.
title: Abana bato bakunda gushyira ibyo babonye byose mu kanwa.
content:
Abana bato bakunda gushyira ibyo babonye byose mu kanwa. Udukoresho duto twose tugomba kubikwa kure y’aho abana bagera, kugirango ubarinde kuba bamira utuntu duto nk’igikoroto, imbuto zikomeye cyangwa amapesu. Ibiryo by’umwana bigomba gukatwa mu dupande duto kugira ngo abashe kubitapfuna no kubimira nta kibazo bimuteye.

Abana bakunze gushyira mu kanwa ibintu bibakikije. Ibi bishobora guhera mu nzira zabo z’ubuhumekero bikabaviramo kubura umwuka. Abana bato ntibiborohera kunyunya ibintu bikomeye nka bombo. Ibyo bishobora guteza ikibazo umwana akabura umwuka igihe abimize. Ni ngombwa rero kubikuraho no kubishyira aho umwana adashyikira kugirango atabimira.
